about_the_game:
The peaceful Duck Village is under attack from terrifying monsters! Armed with weapons, the ducks must defend their home. Visit the Duck Shop to collect a variety of cards, enhance three core attributes, survive the invasion, and drive the monsters away.

Shop:

  • A card-based game where you enhance three core attributes of your character (Attack Power, Attack Speed, and Health) by purchasing, playing, and selling cards.

  • Start the game with talent skills and enter the shop interface. Talent skills assist players in managing their operations within the shop.

  • Each round has a fixed duration, but you can click the ready button to enter combat early.

  • Upgrading the shop allows access to higher-quality cards, but doing so requires a significant amount of gold.

  • Hundreds of cards with different effects are available, offering various ways to enhance character attributes.

  • The Demon Sealing Staff grows stronger by defeating monsters in combat.

  • The Coin grows through repeated buying and selling.

  • More types of cards await your exploration.

  • Combine different cards to create countless synergistic effects. Build your unique card system to achieve maximum efficiency.

Battle:

  • Monsters will spawn automatically and attack the player.

  • Survive 15 levels and defeat the final boss to achieve victory.

  • Defeat monsters to gain experience points and level up to earn skill points.

  • Characters will automatically cast 3 basic skills, each with three branches, generating various effects.

  • For example, the Knife Throwing skill has branches like Splitting, Giant Enhancement, and Increased Damage.

  • More effects await your discovery.

  • Characters can learn ultimate skills at higher levels, each with two branches that enhance basic skills in different ways.

  • Ultimate skills enable interactions between basic skills. Choosing different branches results in distinct attack styles and character growth.

  • Multiple characters are available for players to choose from, making each game a fresh start and allowing you to experience your own combat strategies.

  • Bosses will appear at specific levels, possessing multiple abilities that require players to dodge through precise movement.

  • Winning battles rewards loot to enhance player attributes and prepare for higher difficulty levels.

Gem System

  • Gems can enhance the player’s off-battle attributes, such as melee damage, critical rate, and more.

  • Gems can be refined to increase their strength.

  • Higher difficulty levels offer higher-quality gems, with a chance to drop set or unique gems.

  • Equipping a specific number of set gems grants set effects.

  • Equipping unique gems enhances abilities for specific characters.

name: 鸭鸭大冒险 (Duck Duck Adventure)

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: 鸭鸭大冒险 (Duck Duck Adventure) - $8.99 $7.64 USD

package_groups.title: Buy 鸭鸭大冒险 (Duck Duck Adventure)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Duck Duck Adventure is a 2D top-down roguelike with deck-building mechanics. Play as a duck disguised as various characters to defend a village from invading monsters and bosses. Trade for equipment, craft unique card builds, grow stronger, and survive waves of enemies to claim victory.
